long_description: Designed for use with Kinetic fluid bike trainers, the inRide Power Sensor Pod calculates power output in watts and shares the data with your iPhone or iPad via its Bluetooth Smart(TM) connection. The Kinetic inRide Power Sensor Pod is compatible with the iPhone 4S, 5 series, iPad 3, 4 and Air, and iPod Touch 5th generation. Incredibly accurate fluid trainer power curve allows precise wattage readings at exact speeds measured indoors on a Kinetic fluid trainer (sold separately). Firmware in the inRide Sensor Pod measures speed and cadence at the tire and translates that to wattage with a simple equation. Post-workout file sharing allows you to upload training data to your favorite website or email files to a remote coach. Requires the free Kinetic inRide app.
